mapper.delete: DELETE FROM outsidefactoryhistory WHERE 1 = 1 and id = #{id}

mapper.update:
UPDATE outsidefactoryhistory SET
order_num = #{orderNum},

sharpen_provider_code = #{sharpenProviderCode},
